item.title: Suspect faces terrorism charges in stabbing of 11 at Walmart in Michigan
item.description: Investigators are yet to reveal a motive for Saturday afternoon's attack in Traverse City.

item.title: US begins preparing Qatari jet to be used as Air Force One
item.description: The aircraft - valued at $400m - is being donated by Qatar as an "unconditional gift", with any retrofitting costs being borne by the US government.

item.title: Putin must agree Ukraine ceasefire in 10 or 12 days, says Trump
item.description: The US president says there is "no reason" for waiting amid little sign of progress towards peace.

item.title: Gaza experiencing 'real starvation', Trump says
item.description: The US president's comments come after Israel's prime minister said claims of hunger were a "lie".

item.title: Pro-Ukraine hacker group claims Aeroflot cyber-attack
item.description: The Kremlin says reports of a cyber-attack on Russia's national carrier Aeroflot are "worrying".
